DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize oral omega-3-acid triglyceride form decrease dry-eye related symptom well clinical marker associate dry eye disease ( TearOsmolarity , Schirmer-1 test value , corneal staining , fluorescein tear break-up time ) compare administration placebo .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence PRN Dry Eye Omega-3 Nutritional Regimen Tear Osmolarity In Cases Of Dry Eye Disease

Any OTC habitual artificial tear continue frequency change drop brand Contact lens wear within 12 hour study visit Pregnancy lactation study Abnormal nasolacrimal drainage ( history ) Punctal cauterization punctal plug placement within 60 day screen Prohibited Medications Cyclosporine ( Restasis® ) ; topical prescription medication ( i.e. , steroid , NSAIDs , etc ) ; glaucoma medication ; oral tetracycline topical macrolides ; oral nutraceuticals ( flax , black currant seed oil , etc… ) within 3 week ( 21 day ) Screening time study
